name: Hero Winner
description:
Description of the game:
There is a monster on the screen.
We poke / press a finger - lives are taken from him.
Monster animations - hitting, protecting movement, etc.
If the monster hits, and your finger touches the screen, then the player's life is taken away.
Defeated the monster - moved to the next level.   

Features:
Attractive art and animation.
As easy as possible to program.
No updates, weapons, achievements, etc.
The game should be as simple as 5 cents.
